ModMetadata.Name: Re-Volt [StationeersMods]
ModMetadata.Author: Sukasa
ModMetadata.Description: [h1]ReVolt[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersLaunchPad Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad Re-Volt is an electrical overhaul mod for Stationeers
ModMetadata.InGameDescription: ReVolt WARNING: This is a StationeersLaunchPad Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad Description for ReVolt
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]Version 0.0.1:[/h3] [list] [*]Not even the initial release, this is just getting it to build and load! [/list]
